metadata.synopsis: Short dialogue where a civilian, saved by the players from a Sahuagin attack on a small beach in Baldur's Gate,
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use ReCon command "goto 52 3 -138"- "killcombat" to kill all the Sahuagin after they appear and attack.- This dialogue will play after a short delay, between a player who was in that combat and one of the civilians here.

0.speaker: Flaheerta, Sailor Peete, Hucinda, Old Troutman, Rossina, Grout, Nonabune
0.text: Thank you for cutting those creatures down, truly. Gods know what would've happened if you weren't here.
